trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Milton
There were no other sightings in Milton on or around February 4th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsat 6pm we observed 4 bright (burnt) orange colored lights, after we noticed them they went out shortly after the sighting. they were low on the horizon and about 3 miles aways to our east, there may have been more as we observed them thru trees. they seemed to be off set, not in a straight line? My wife spotted them first and was pointing trying to get my daughters attention and then me I caught the last 10 seconds of the sighting.we were all sitting out side on the patio,they were real bright and have never seen anything like it in the 10 years at this address. It was cold and clear skys. we smoke outside and all 4 of us were talking when my wife said what is that pointing to the east after getting my daughters attention sitting next to me I then turned to see the lights wink out, the were very unusal bright. I was going to get in my car and drive to the area but Ive had surgery so I walked to the front yard to see if it had moved or reappeared in another location. light did not reappear.
